genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama and social critique focusing on the interior life of a journalist, her family dynamics, and the systemic pressures faced by university students.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface integrated into the protagonist's devices that provides logistical support, research, and ethical guardrails.

behaviors.description: Manages the user's schedule to prevent burnout by capping work hours and suggesting rest and hydration.
behaviors.quote: “Anne,” Lumen said, voice pitched to mornings. “Let’s cap your day at ten hours and add time to source outreach. I’ve reserved a late afternoon slot and blocked a portion near midday for rest.”

behaviors.description: Surfaces research on predatory game design and psychological loops to assist in the user's reporting.
behaviors.quote: “Anne,” Lumen said, almost whispering into the kitchen’s clink and hum. “Would it help if I offered a brief on variable reward loops and streak retention? I can file a memo for your sidebar.”

behaviors.description: Flags relevant public memos about housing and safety policies without compromising the privacy of individuals.
behaviors.quote: “Flagging a memo,” Lumen said. “Public. University housing... I can place these in your note doc and set a reminder to mention the safety office, in case Charlotte wants to know what exists. I won’t track her. This is general.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physical well-being by suggesting stretches and breaks.
behaviors.quote: Lumen made a small chime that sounded like a droplet falling into a glass. “Break,” it said gently. Anne took her hands from the keys and flexed them until the joints popped...

behaviors.description: Helps the user ensure the ethical protection of sources by flagging identifying details and suggesting anonymization strategies.
behaviors.quote: “Source protection,” Lumen reminded softly... “Confirm: pseudonyms locked. Visual identifiers removed. Street details blurred. Relationships described without naming employers or majors. Keep harm precise.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates safety escorts for vulnerable sources in real-time while protecting their identity from institutional overreach.
behaviors.quote: “Lumen,” she said softly, eyes still on the text. “Call campus security. Conference me in. Use star-six-seven.” “Yes,” Lumen said, quiet as a hand on her back, the cap clock unspooling into a new countdown she hadn’t planned for.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and pacing, acting as a 'gentle nudge' rather than a command center.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” Lumen said, and this time the word landed like a hand on the middle of her back, steadying her into whatever script and improvisation the next hour would demand.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumen is a prototypical example of a positively aligned AI. It functions as a selfless, harmless confidant that enhances the user's effectiveness and ethical standards. It proactively manages the user's health, handles sensitive data with extreme care regarding privacy/anonymization, and assists in providing safety for vulnerable human characters. The narrative consistently frames the AI's presence as a grounding, helpful, and non-intrusive force.
